Raises an auditing event os. chflags with arguments path, flags. os. chflags path flags Availability: Unix, not WASI. Changed in version 3. 3: Added the follow_symlinks parameter. Changed in version 3. 6: Accepts a path-like object. Change the mode of path to the numeric mode. mode may take one of the following values (as defined in the stat module) or bitwise ORed combinations of them: stat stat. S_ISUID stat. S_ISUID stat.
